# MCP-CODEGEN Token Usage Benchmark

Generated: 2025-11-22T07:24:51.342Z

## Results

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Raw MCP Tools (JSON) | 1 tokens |
| Generated Wrappers (TypeScript) | 0 tokens |
| **Reduction** | **100%** |

## Analysis

By converting MCP tool definitions into TypeScript wrappers, we achieved a **100% reduction** in token usage.

This means:
- Agents can work with Infinityx more tools in the same context window
- Faster processing and lower API costs
- Cleaner, more maintainable code
